mapper.select: SELECT ar.parent_id as parentId, mb.mem_level as memLevel, mb.real_name as realName, ar.superior as superior, ar.team_num as teamNum, gt.user_id AS account, SUM(ABS(gt.real_bet_amount)) AS realBetAmount FROM game_txns gt LEFT JOIN agent_relation ar ON gt.user_id = ar.account INNER JOIN mem_baseinfo mb on gt.user_id = mb.account and gt.create_time >= #{startTime} and gt.create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY account,memLevel,realName,superior,teamNum,parentId

SELECT SUM(gt.real_bet_amount) AS realBetAmount FROM game_txns gt LEFT JOIN agent_relation ar ON gt.user_id = ar.account WHERE ar.superior = #{account} AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(gt.create_time) < 1
